Title: eGrid: Multi-touch Tabletop Environment for Electricity GIS maps
Description:
eGrid is a multi-touch tabletop application designed for the operation of control rooms of electricity companies. 

The current version runs on windows 7, using WPF 4.0, the Microsoft Surface Toolkit and TouchToolkit.
